definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Amorphophallus Campanulatus Powder, Soya Bean Fibre, Starch, Vegetarian Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 魔芋粉，大豆纖維，澱粉，素食調味料。

sentences.english: B. The food tasted bad, however Aunt Kit fixed it.
sentences.chinese: 飯菜不好喫，可姬特姑媽還往裏加調味料。

sentences.english: So, reluctantly, he cut back on the sauces and the onions.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他有些不願意將減少了調味料和洋蔥。

sentences.english: Mix egg whites and milk. Add seasoning and crab meat and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白與鮮奶拌勻，加入調味料與蟹肉拌勻。

sentences.english: Mix in natural vanilla flavoring for a soothing snack.
sentences.chinese: 此外，你還可以在點心中加入點天然的香草調味料。

sentences.english: Do you want relish and onion on your hamburger?
sentences.chinese: 即要不要夾酸黃瓜等調味料和洋蔥。

sentences.english: Soya Bean Protein, Starch, Mushroom, Vegetable, Vegetarian Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 大豆蛋白，澱粉，香菇，蔬菜，素食調味料。

sentences.english: Skin and then dice the chicken fillet into cubes . Season and marinate for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把雞肉去皮後切粒，拌入調味料醃15分鐘。

sentences.english: Use water from mountain creeks, original taste and no spices.
sentences.chinese: 全部使用山泉水，原汁原味無放任何調味料。

sentences.english: Put the seaweed on top of the soba and serve with dip.
sentences.chinese: 在蕎麥麪上灑上海帶及配以調味料伴食。

sentences.english: Mix bean curd and dace with seasoning mix. Stir well and put on a deep serving plate.
sentences.chinese: 將調味料加入豆腐及鯪魚肉中，拌勻後放入深碟內。

sentences.english: It's steamed and served with our special sauce.
sentences.chinese: 蒸過後加上本店特製的調味料。

sentences.english: Irish cream and Hazelnut are the most popular whole bean coffee flavorings .
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭奶酪和榛果是最常用的整豆咖啡的調味料。

sentences.english: Trim and slice turkey giblets. Mix in seasoning and marinate for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 火雞腎去筋，切片，拌入調味料醃15分鐘。

sentences.english: This orange drink contains no artificial flavourings.
sentences.chinese: 這種橙汁飲品不含人工調味料。

sentences.english: Wash shrimps thoroughly, add in seasonings and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 基圍蝦沖洗乾淨，加調味料拌勻。
